name: SIONAN
description:
You've been sent to collect logs relating to a facility's mysterious destruction. Guided only by a voice and hounded by a robot, you must uncover what happened to the researchers...

  • Sci-fi walking sim with technological-horror elements
  • Collect seven logs
  • Ignore the ramblings of a maddened robot
  • Created in Unreal Engine
  • Made with plenty of assistance from Senscape, the developers behind Scratches and ASYLUM!
  • Visual assets by Epic Games and Julio Juarez
  • Voice acting by the developer!
